meanings.definition: A green variety of chalcedony used as a gemstone.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful chrysoprase necklace to the party.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler displayed a stunning chrysoprase ring in the window.
meanings.sent3: The chrysoprase gem sparkled like a tiny green star.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone with the brilliance of chrysoprase in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The chrysoprase gemstone seemed to hold the essence of nature within.

meanings.sent1: The artist mixed blue and yellow to create a lovely chrysoprase hue.
meanings.sent2: The walls of the room were painted in a calming chrysoprase shade.
meanings.sent3: The chrysoprase color of the dress made her look like a forest fairy.
meanings.sent4: The fields outside turned a vibrant chrysoprase after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The chrysoprase tint of the sky at sunset was breathtaking.
